creator: jburgess@delanotech.com
text:
On page "http://jakarta.apache.org/tomcat/index.html", the version number is 
wrong in the following sentence (it should be 4.0.4):

"Tomcat 4.0.x. Tomcat 4.0.3 is the current production quality release."
It has been corrected (but I don't know when)
creator: funkman@joedog.org
